Why must use computer software to transfer

  • 1. Will my device data be affected after using your software?

    No. All the data on your iPhone or Android phone will not be affected.

  • 2. How long will it take to transfer WhatsApp messages?

    The transferring time depends on the data size of the WhatsApp data to be transferred. Generally, it can be several minutes or an hour.

  • 3. What’s the Differences between the trial and full version?

    You can use the free trial version to back up WhatsApp messages. To transfer or restore WhatsApp, you will need to upgrade from trial version to full version.

  • 4. Is it possible to restore WhatsApp without uninstalling this application?

    With Mobitrix WhatsApp Transfer, you can restore your WhatsApp messages without uninstalling, but the existing WhatsApp data on your device will be overwritten by the data in the backup.

  • 5. Is it secure to install the customized WhatsApp on my device?

    Yes. We guarantee that it is 100% safe to install the customized WhatsApp. We will never keep or use your device data. Therefore, you don’t have to worry about the data security.
